title: My apps frequently move unexpectedly. This time I can't move them back. The grid does by show up and
content:
I'm frustrated by my apps randomly moving. But today something has changed so I can't move them back. I hold down on it and move it where I want it, but it doesn't stick and just slides back. The usual grid for alignment doesn't come up. I figure a setting has changed but I can't find it.
Help?
